    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadBufferHelper

        public ReadBufferHelper(java.io.RandomAccessFile file,
                        int block_size,
                        Volume volume)
        This Buffer Helper facilitates the buffered reading of the Volume's random access file.
        Parameters:
        file - This is the file associated with the Volume
        block_size - This is the block size of the file system
        volume - This would be the Volume of the file system.

    • Method Detail

        public Superblock get_superblock()

        This is the SuperBlock object associated with the first copy of the SuperBlock of the file system.

      • get_subdirectory_inode_numbers

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> get_subdirectory_inode_numbers(int directory_block_number)
        This will return the inode numbers of the contents of the directory that are themselves also directories.
        Parameters:
        directory_block_number - This is the block number of the directory.
        Returns:
        This will be a list of all the inode numbers of the directory that are themselves also directories.

      • read

        public byte[] read(long start,
                   long offset)
        This will read data from an Ext2File from the start to the offset of the said file into an array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        start - The byte one would like to begin reading from
        offset - The byte at which one would like to finish reading
        Returns:
        An array of all read bytes
